title: Fly for Me
description: The boy who was bullied became a Master. William Carradine spent his childhood as the main target of brutal beatings and homophobic slurs - not all of them from his classmates. He knows what it is to be different, to be so far apart from society's definition of normal that it scares people to be around him, and yet his only sin is being bisexual. Known as the Viking Master in Club Avalon, he rarely gets a chance to play. For the past two years, he's watched his friends, one by one, find their submissive and fall in love--including his best friend, Boadicea, and his boss, Braun. When opportunity comes calling, Liam is hesitant to answer, too used to rejection to open his heart again, but his destiny isn't in commanding one submissive, but two. But two subs means double trouble...
author: Kay Elle Parker
